flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 6+3*20=<<6+3*20=70>>70 plates.
Angela has 1/2*70=<<1/2*70=35>>35 cutlery.
Sharon wants to buy 1/2*20=<<1/2*20=10>>10 pots.
Sharon wants to buy 3*70-20=<<3*70-20=190>>190 plates.
Sharon wants to buy 2*35= <<2*35=70>>70 cutlery.
Sharon wants to buy a total of 10+190+70=<<10+190+70=270>>270 kitchen supplies.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 66, not 70. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
